708080f-b.title: Manhattan: 3rd Avenue - 48th Street (East)
708080f-b.text:
(1)
Third Ave., west side, north from East 48th Street. Also shown is
East 48th Street, at, adjoining and west of the N.W. corner of Third Ave.
October 26, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2;
The same, north from but not including East 48th Street. Intersection
shown in the foreground is 49th Street.
October 24, 1928.
'L. Sperr.  NO REPRODUCTIONS.

730303f-a.title: General view - [Manhattan - 48th Street - 3rd Avenue (Northeast).]
730303f-a.text:
A general view, northeast, from 48th., Street, east of Third Ave.
October 26, 1928.
P. L. Sper.

730302f-a.title: General view - [Manhattan - 48th Street - 3rd Avenue (Southeast).]
730302f-a.text:
A general view, southeast, from 48th Street, and Third Ave.
October 24, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

730305f-a.title: General view - [Manhattan - 48th Street - 3rd Avenue (Southeast).]
730305f-a.text:
A general view, southeast, from 48th Street, east of Third Ave.
October 26, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
